attributes.additional_details:
metering solutions  When smart Metering kicks off all the big companys have a manoply on all the work that is unfair on small buisiness who would like a piece of the pie.
It is a clear indicaton that there is no diversity in regards to all the big buisiness who are sharing the work amongst them selves and almost imposible for small buisinesses to get any of the metering contracts.
